1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
4{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
5{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
6
7-- | CSV output.
8
9module Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Csv
10  ( resultCsv,
11    resultCsvHeading,
12    resultTsvHeading,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Data.Char                 as Ch
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture  as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base      as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax    as S
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type      as T
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data      as D
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core      as C
22
23
24-- --------------------------------------------  Writer
25
26-- | Comman-separated-values output without heading.
27resultCsv :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
28resultCsv = C.ResultWriterChunk "csv" $ hPutXsv csvSetting
29
30-- | Comman-separated-values output with heading.
31resultCsvHeading :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
32resultCsvHeading = C.ResultWriterChunk "csv-heading" $ hPutXsv csvHeadSetting
33
34-- | Tab-separated-values output with heading.
35resultTsvHeading :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
36resultTsvHeading = C.ResultWriterChunk "tab-heading" $ hPutXsv tabHeadSetting
37
38hPutXsv :: forall c. (D.CContent c) => XsvSetting -> C.ResultWriterChunk c
39hPutXsv setting@XsvSetting { xsvHead = isHead, xsvSep = sep, xsvQuote = quote } h _ status sh =
40    do let csv = concatMap toCsv chunks
41       B.hPutMixLines B.crlfBreak h csv
42       return status
43    where
44      chunks = concatMap S.shortBody sh
45
46      toCsv :: C.ResultChunk c -> [B.MixText]
47      toCsv (C.ResultRel _ (T.Rel he bo)) = appendHead he (line <$> bo)
48      toCsv _ = []
49
50      join :: [B.MixText] -> B.MixText
51      join = B.mixJoin $ B.mix sep
52
53      line :: [c] -> B.MixText
54      line = join . map (csvContent setting)
55
56      appendHead he xs
57          | isHead    = join (mixName <$> T.getTermNames he) : xs
58          | otherwise = xs
59      mixName = (B.mix . quote . S.stringChars . S.termNameContent)
60
61csvContent :: (D.CContent c) => XsvSetting -> c -> B.MixText
62csvContent setting@XsvSetting { xsvQuote = quote } c
63    | D.isCode   c  = B.mix $ quote $ D.gCode c
64    | D.isText   c  = B.mix $ quote $ D.gText c
65    | D.isTerm   c  = B.mix $ quote $ S.termNameChars $ D.gTerm c
66    | D.isDec    c  = B.mix (T.encodeDecimalCompact $ D.gDec c :: S.Chars)
67    | D.isClock  c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gClock c
68    | D.isTime   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gTime c
69    | D.isBool   c  = boolToMix $ D.gBool c
70
71    | D.isList   c  = csvSubs setting $ D.gList c
72    | D.isSet    c  = csvSubs setting $ D.gSet c 
73    | otherwise     = B.mix $ D.contentString c
74
75csvSubs :: (D.CContent c) => XsvSetting -> [c] -> B.MixText
76csvSubs setting@XsvSetting { xsvSubSep = sub } cs =
77    B.mixJoin (B.mix sub) (csvContent setting <$> cs)
78
79boolToMix :: Bool -> B.MixText
80boolToMix True  = B.mixString "true"
81boolToMix False = B.mixString "false"
82
83-- --------------------------------------------  Setting
84
85data XsvSetting = XsvSetting
86    { xsvHead     :: Bool
87    , xsvSep      :: String
88    , xsvSubSep   :: String
89    , xsvQuote    :: S.CharsMap
90    }
91
92csvSetting :: XsvSetting
93csvSetting = XsvSetting { xsvHead    = False
94                        , xsvSep     = ","
95                        , xsvSubSep  = "|"
96                        , xsvQuote   = enquote }
97
98tabSetting :: XsvSetting
99tabSetting = XsvSetting { xsvHead    = False
100                        , xsvSep     = "\t"
101                        , xsvSubSep  = "|"
102                        , xsvQuote  = toSpace }
103
104csvHeadSetting :: XsvSetting
105csvHeadSetting = csvSetting { xsvHead = True }
106
107tabHeadSetting :: XsvSetting
108tabHeadSetting = tabSetting { xsvHead = True }
109
110{-| Enclose text in double quotations.
111
112    >>> putStrLn $ enquote "foo"
113    "foo"
114
115    >>> putStrLn $ enquote "foo\"bar"
116    "foo""bar"
117    -}
118enquote :: (O.Textual t) => t -> t
119enquote t = let t' = replace (== '"') "\"\"" t
120            in "\"" O.++ t' O.++ "\""
121
122{-| Convert control characters to space character.
123
124    >>> putStrLn $ toSpace "foo"
125    foo
126
127    >>> putStrLn $ toSpace "foo\r\nbar"
128    foo  bar
129    -}
130toSpace :: (O.Textual t) => t -> t
131toSpace = replace Ch.isControl " "
132
133{-| Replace character in text.
134
135    >>> replace '.' "--" "foo.bar..baz."
136    "foo--bar----baz--"
137    -}
138replace :: (O.Textual t) => O.Test Char -> t -> t -> t
139replace from to = loop where
140    loop t = case O.span (not . from) t of
141               (a, b) | O.tIsEmpty b -> a
142                      | O.tIsEmpty a -> rep b
143                      | otherwise    -> a O.++ rep b
144
145    rep (O.cut -> O.Jp c t)
146        | from c      = to O.++ loop t
147        | otherwise   = c O.<:> loop t
148    rep t = t
149
